revision.text: Possibly: The evangelical expositor: or, a commentary on the Holy Bible. Wherein the sacred text of the Old and New Testament is inserted at large; the Sense Explained; and the more difficult Passages Elucidated: with Practical Observations. Also References to Parallel Scriptures; the Marginal Readings; and a Chronology. For the Use of Families and Private Christians of every Denomination. By the Reverend Thomas Haweis, Rector of Aldwinckle, Northamptonshire, and Chaplain to the Right Honourable the Earl of Peterborow. 2v. (London : Printed for Edward and Charles Dilly, in the Poultry, near the Mansion-House, [1765]-MDCCLXVI. [1765-1766]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2515506~S1
